DevComment: Shown on item comparison tooltips to say that this is the currently equipped item
Header line for item requirements in tooltips
Optional {LevelSuffix} to insert into the item_subline
Quest items show this instead of the item_subline
Switch back to the normal inventory

SourceString: You have reached the maximum amount of equipped Relics (<gold>{Amount}</>).
You have reached the maximum amount of equipped Relics and Charms (<gold>{Amount}</>).
You cannot equip Relics and Charms yet.
These mystical embers pulse with a dark magic… perhaps they’d be useful to one who studies ancient witchcraft.
Charms and Relics cannot be socketed into Epic items.
